dropdown-label-icon\"></i>\n\t\t\t\t\t<b class=\"dropdown-label-value\">Store Locations</b>\n\t\t\t\t\t<i class=\"dropdown-label-arrow\">â–¼</i>\n\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t</dt>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<dd class=\"dropdown-panel dropdown-panel-location\">\n\t\t\t\t<ul class=\"reset dropdown-panel-list\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<li><a href=\"/stores/appleton-darboy\">Appleton - class=\"splash-wrapper\">\n    <div class=\"flexslider splash-slider\" data-flexslider-theme=\"a\">\n        <ul class=\"slides\">\n                        <li>\n                <section class=\"page-section-content ps--bg-black ps--bordered--all\">\n\n        <div class=\"container-inside--large\">\n                        <div class=\"splash-halves\">\n\n                                    <figure class=\"splash-half splash-half--left\">\n\t<a href=\"https://www.festfoods.com/mealtime\" class=\"splash-halves-link\"><span class=\"hide\">MEALTIME MENTORS</span></a>\n\t<img class=\"splash-halves-content\">\n\t\t<div class=\"splash-halves-content-inner\">\n\t\t\t<i class=\"icon-before icon-arrow-right splash-halves-icon\"></i>\n\t\t\t<h5 class=\"heading splash-halves-heading\">MEALTIME MENTORS</h5>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"splash-halves-description\">Find recipe tips, tricks and top picks!</p>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t</div> <!-- .splash-halves-content-inner -->\n\t</figcaption> <!-- .splash-halves-content -->\n</figure>\n                \n                                    <figure class=\"splash-half splash-half--right\">\n\t<a href=\"https://www.festfoods.com/insider/2017/april\" class=\"splash-halves-link\"><span class=\"hide\">APRIL INSIDER PAGE</span></a>\n\t<img src=\"https://s3.amazonaws.com/cms.festfoods.com/files/callout/2017-04/april-insider%20%281%29_0.jpg\" class=\"splash-halves-image\" alt=\"Photo of - APRIL INSIDER PAGE\">\n\t<figcaption class=\"splash-halves-content\">\n\t\t<div class=\"splash-halves-content-inner\">\n\t\t\t<i class=\"icon-before icon-arrow-right splash-halves-icon\"></i>\n\t\t\t<h5 class=\"heading splash-halves-heading\">APRIL INSIDER PAGE</h5>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"splash-halves-description\">Let us help you gear up for grilling!</p>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t</div> <!-- .splash-halves-content-inner -->\n\t</figcaption> <!-- .splash-halves-content -->\n</figure>\n                \n            </div> <!-- .splash-halves -->\n                    </div> <!-- .container-inside -->\n\n    </div> <!-- .page-section-content -->\n\n</section> <!-- .page-section -->\n\n\n<section class=\"page-section\">\n\n    <div class=\"page-section-content ps--bg-default 'localStorage' in window && window['localStorage'] !== null;\n\t} catch(e) {\n\t\treturn false;\n\t}\n}\n\n//Only load modal window if browser supports localstorage.\nif(localstorage_support())\n{\n\t$(window).load(function(e) {\n\t\t\t\n\t\t//Delay the code so the rest of the page can load first\n\t\tsetTimeout(function(){\n\t\t\n\t\t\tvar $modal = $(\".site-helper\").remodal();\n\t\t\tvar ignore_notice = localStorage.getItem(\"hide-shop-festfoods-com-notice\");\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\tif($modal != undefined && ignore_notice == null) {\n\t\t\t\t$(document).on(\"closed\", \".site-helper\", function (e) {\n\t\t\t\t\t$(this).html(\"\"); //Clear out the HTML so the video stops playing\n\t\t\t\t\tlocalStorage.setItem(\"hide-shop-festfoods-com-notice\", \"true\");\n\t\t\t\t});\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t//Don't load the video on page load, display most of the content first.\n\t\t\t\t$(document).on(\"opened\", \".site-helper\", function (e) {\t\n\t\t\t\t\tvar iframe = $(\".site-helper\").find(\"iframe\")\n\t\t\t\t\tiframe.attr(\"src\", iframe.attr(\"data-src\"));\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t$(\".site-helper\").fitVids();\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t});\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t$modal.open();\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\n\t\t}, 1000);\n\t\t\n\t\t\n\t\t$(document).on(\"click\", \".event-hide-shop-festfoods-com-notice\", function(e) {\n\t\t\tvar t = $(this);\t\n\t\t\tlocalStorage.setItem(\"hide-shop-festfoods-com-notice\", \"true\");\n\t\t});\t\t\n\t\n\t});\n}\n</script>\n\n<style>\n.header\n{   \nposition: relative;\nz-index: 99; \n}\n.navigate { z-index: 9; }\n</style>\n\n<div class=\"site-helper\"
